m.id_photo, m.birthday, m.member_name, m.nickname, m.email
FROM (nm_member AS m LEFT JOIN nm_group_member AS gm ON m.member_no=gm.member_no) LEFT JOIN nm_group AS g ON g.group_no=gm.group_no
